alert.note: Alert for Glades (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 29 at 2:55AM EST until January 29 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 20 degrees. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 35 degrees. * WHERE...Glades County. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, from 1 AM to 9 AM EST Sunday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 9 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could result in hypothermia or frostbite if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
